title: Why isn't meteos on fly quest lcs team?
body:
I was just curious why meteos isnt on fly quest. Does any one know of have an article they can point me too? Fly quest is pretty much the old c9 without sneaky and meteos. Im curious why meteos didn't transition to fly quest like some of the other former c9 members.

Any input or links to articles detailing why the transition didn't happen would be nice. Thanks

replies.body: Flyquest was a team made with Balls, Contracz, Hai, Altec, and LemonNation for Challenger Series as C9 Challenger. Meteos was still on the C9 main team. When they qualified for LCS, Meteos retired, Contracz went to the C9 main team, and C9C/FLY picked up Moon. All the other former C9 players were already there, and Meteos never had any reason to go there.

1. Meteos and Hai 
 Rather you believe it or not and  if it's true or not but I don't think they like playing together.  I think that was a core reason why C9 broke up with Meteos and Hai on opposite side of the fence, Meteos had his way of doing things and Hai had his. 
  Hai replaced Meteos and Cloud 9 who were looking complete garbage and he picked them up and carried C9 to Worlds something I don't think Meteos could have done.  
  So that was a big no no as it showed fans who carried whom even if it was for just 1 split fans at that point were pretty much saying " Meteos was the reason why C9 sucked and Hai's shotcalling etc etc" at that point is where the Hai shotcalling became a thing 10 fold and I'm sure being replaced and being cast as the villain got to Meteos and Hai's relationship. 

 2. 2013 - Meteos has been playing since 2013 most players from 2013 are becoming tired, exhausted, or retired from the 2013 years. Dyrus, Oddone, Reginald, Yellowstar, Xpeke, Cyanaide, Voyboy, Imaqtpie,(D-Lift) it's a potential wast of $ from both players on FlyQuest and the org to put their money into Meteos knowing it's only a matter of 1-2 splits till he too retires, and for a young org team it's wasted $ in the longrun.    It's like when the Lakers paid Kobe Bryant's contracts for his final 4 years and ........... they sucked and now the Lakers are paying for it and most likely will for the next 5 years just because of that alone.  Replace LAL with FQ and Kobe Bryant with Meteos and there would be FlyQuest's future 8-9 place for the next 2-3 years. 

3. Young talent - FQ are top 4 material with just a mix of old veterans and young talent, once the vets leave the 2 newer players can help teach the newer recruits and etc etc.

Baku with the knowledges. Love this guy. Even if he hates my hatred of liquid and deebeesteevee.
lol, long time no see !  Thank you

> 3. Young talent - FQ are top 4 material with just a mix of old veterans and young talent, once the vets leave the 2 newer players can help teach the newer recruits and etc etc.

Didn't Meteos carry them the last split to worlds without Hai?

He did, I'm not saying Meteos couldn't and/or never did I'm just saying a main reason why was because he was the one driving and not Hai because of their relationship.   
  Look at C9 when Hai took C9 to Worlds ( Balls, Sneaky, Lemon, Jensen) now look at the C9 team when Meteos took C9 to Worlds ( Impact, Jensen, Sneaky, Smoothie). 

  Back in 2015 Balls was pretty much "bad" like washed up his stats and production for C9 got lower and lower and lower through the years, Lemon didn't even have a kill till week 8 or something and wasn't having a great split, and Jensen was a rookie at the time.  
  Meteos had Impact which HE was the player that actually carried C9 to Worlds( Top die) and Jensen who wasn't a rookie at the time had exp under his belt with Smoothie being the true shotcaller instead of Meteos. 

  Many fans will say Hai > Meteos because of the whole " Shotcalling" is being played up so much.  
2015 Summer Hai played in less games than what Meteos did and had 2x better stats than Meteos.

because they didn't want him?

He cant force the GM/owner/whoever gets the personnel on the team to draft him.
Because Moon is far better mechanically, and with Hai covering for his lack of shotcalling, he is performing really well?
